Name: Drill Arena
About the game: Fight in a brutal battle between robots with drills. In the arena there are only you and your opponents. Only the most sturdy and agile robot will survive! Features Online steam multiplayer for 2-6 players 3 types of robots to play with different advantages and disadvantages Custom color of your robot Opponents are equal to you in terms of capabilities and will use all methods available to you for survival
